name: The Forgotten of Kailash
description:
Venture into a mysterious temple, looking for Your lost friend. Beware, You feel a presence - You are not alone here.

Credits:

  • Programming - Tolly Kulczycki
  • 3D Models - Jarek Pałys
  • Game Design - Jakub "MrPatapon" Mrozicki
  • Narration - Marie Sielecki
  • 2D Assets - Pola Aleksandrowicz

Spatium by Keys of Moon | https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon
